beer.beer_description:
At the dawn of our time, near to a future sun, in the imagined universe of reality, dwells the Sky Kraken. A contradiction of the senses offering ripe melon, juicy citrus, pineapple and pepper flavors to the brave. An idea brought together by the cosmic attraction of opposites, Sky Kraken is a naturally unfiltered beer. Sky Kraken is also just a really cool name for this really cool beer that we wanted to brew using the hops we love. We hope you love it, too. Or, at least, love the Sky Kraken and become a believer. “I Believe.” – VWP

Down & Dirty: 2-Row Pale malt, White Wheat, Flaked Wheat, Malted Oats, and Rolled Oats with Citra®, Mosaic®, and Strata® hops.

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 56)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 57!

As the hub of the town's social scene, your local pub has what you're craving. Be sure to stop by for a pint or two! That's a beer at 25 different venues with the categories of Pub, Irish Pub or Gastropub. Visit 5 more for Level 6!

items.badge_description:
Start the season off right with your friends from Punch Cigars! Get to know the Official Cigar of Beer Lovers a little better here: www.punchcigars.com.
For sale in the U.S. only.
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 45 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 10.

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 170 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 35!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 3)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 4!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 5 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.checkin_comment: Smooth flavor, not heavy, a little bite to it.

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 490 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 99!

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 60 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 13!

Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 35 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 8!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 385 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 78!
